item.title: [317] Command Issue [/317]
item.dc:creator: @Smudss Smudss
item.description:
@Smudss wrote:

Well, I have an issue. I’m trying to make a method of using archery tickets as a currency.
I’ve made all the commands (with issues I’ll mention). My idea is to use ::addticket to receive an archery ticket worth 2147M (or whatever the max is :s). So when you use ::addticket it takes the cash and gives you a ticket.
Same goes for ::exchangeticket. Takes the ticket, gives the cash.

The issue is that even when there’s not for example cash in the inventory it still gives you a ticket.
My code is this…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("addticket")){ if(playerHasItem(995, 2147000000)) deleteItem(995, 2147000000); addItem(1464, 1);
That’s the one that gives you the ticket and takes the cash (obviously).

And here is the where you give a ticket for the cash.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("exchangeticket")){ if(playerHasItem(1464, 1)) deleteItem(1464, 1); addItem(995, 2147000000);
No errors come in the compiler, it’s just that it works without the required items :s…

Thanks for the help/just even reading this.

Read full topic
